response.original_title: Lieutenant-Colonel Theodore Roosevelt arrives in New York after the World War
response.overview: Theodore Roosevelt Jr., suffering from a machine gun wound in the leg, returned as a casual from France to New York City aboard the Mauretania on March 6, 1919. Medium close shot of TR Jr., dressed in uniform, aboard what may be the liner Mauretania, docked at the Cunard pier, North River, New York City.
response.title: Lieutenant-Colonel Theodore Roosevelt arrives in New York after the World War
